text:
Maxflow (CrazyGames.com) | Hasselt / Leuven, Belgium | Full stack developer | Onsite

Looking for someone to join Maxflow in Leuven or Hasselt (Belgium). You will be working directly with the founder in building out new products, both in the game space as in the personal finance space. Technology used is Python and PHP for backend and React + Redux for frontend. Experience with AWS, DevOps, and / or Flash / Unity game development is a plus.

Reach out: info@maxflow.be
